description: MAFELOE Wrist Corsage and Boutonniere Set for Wedding Party Prom Homecoming Suit
Package includes: 1 pc of boutonniere and 1 pc of wrist corsage

The boutonnieres and wrist corsages sets are handmade of real-looking silk flowers, greeneries and ribbons, dotted with other accessories. They are all handmade, exquisite and noble, and will not easily fade. Classic and elegant color combination, easy to match with your wedding, party or prom dress.

There are pins and clips on the back of the men boutonniere. You can choose to fasten the boutonniere to the collar with the pin or clip it onto the pocket. The wrist flowers feature ribbons that can be tied around the hand and fits most wrist sizes.
There are a variety of colors and styles for you to choose. These boutonnieres and corsages sets bang on trend, chic and elegant, forever classic and popular wedding party colors.
A wide range of applications, perfect for weddings, proms, party, ceremony, anniversary, homecoming and other special events.
When wearing the men boutonniere, please be careful of the pin to avoid hurting your hands.
There might be a slight color difference when finished because of different dye lots of the flower. Please kindly understand that!
Due to the different displays, the pictures and objects may be slightly different.
